| HistoryText             = The Night People were the residents of an asylum at Zero Street who were transported by [[Abner Doolittle (Earth-616)|Abner Doolittle]] to another dimension. From there, they began making raids to Earth, obtaining various objects for Doolittle and kidnapping the [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Falcon]]'s girlfriend [[Leila Taylor (Earth-616)|Leila Taylor]] in order to lure him to them.{{r|Captain America #201}} They brainwashed the Falcon so he would combat the fire-breathing monsters their dimension that inhabited their dimension.{{r|Captain America #202}} They returned to Earth through Doolittle's portal when their asylum was overrun by the native monsters.{{r|Captain America #203}}{{r|Marvel Team-Up #52}} They were then institutionalized in a [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|SHIELD]] psychiatric ward.{{r|Captain America #204}}
